publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2786 Stuart McMillan: New Moderator Appointed by Kirk—That the Parliament congratulates the Reverend William Hewitt, minister of Westburn Church in Greenock, who has been chosen to be the new moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland; notes that Reverend Hewitt was chosen for the role by a committee of more than 50 church officials; further notes that the minister is a former president of the 200-year-old Greenock Burns Club and a frequent speaker at Burns events; acknowledges Reverend Hewitt’s long-standing association as a parish minister for 30 years, and wishes him every success in his new role. Supported by: Nanette Milne*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Bashir Ahmad*, Andrew Welsh*, John Lamont*, Robin Harper*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-2786 New Moderator Appointed by Kirk (lodged on 29 October 2008) Alex Neil*, Ken Macintosh*, Jamie Hepburn*, Ross Finnie*, Keith Brown*, Jack McConnell*, John Scott*, Hugh Henry*
